title: Shiru
author: Shiru
content: CryptoCossacks Club - Ukrainian NFT Avatar Collection & Community - Claim your unique Cossack Avatars and join the community of Ukrainian supporters via Web3 initiativesArt collection reflecting the masculinity of the Ukrainian people. Money raised will go to support the Ukrainian Developers & help people in these difficult timeCryptoCossacks Club is a Ukrainian NFT Avatar Collection & Community https://cryptocossacks.com/It's reflecting the masculinity and rebelliousness of the Ukrainian people. All money raised will go to support the Ukrainian army and help people in these difficult times It's a limited NFT collection created to perpetuate, tokenize Ukrainian culture and spread awareness about the war in Ukraine around the world. The collection is created by a Ukrainian digital artist and a software development team that has been directly affected by the conflict. Whitelist spots still available on Discord: https://discord.gg/qh3tqkaMES  50% of the raised money will go to Ukrainian charitable foundations. The remaining 50% of the funding will be used to support the Cossacks community, and launch innovative Web3 products.Website: https://cryptocossacks.com/Twitter: https://twitter.com/crypto_cossacks[/size]
